title: Ayurveda Pure Aromatherapy Dosha Blend Kit
description: This kit contains three 5ml ayurveda blends: vata blend kapha blend pitta blend Included in this kit is Guide to Understanding your Doshas booklet which contains information about Ayurveda and the three doshas, a questionnaire for determining and getting to know your doshas, and instructions on how...
cleaned_text: This kit contains three 5ml ayurveda blends: - vata blend - kapha blend - pitta blend Included in this kit is Guide to Understanding your Doshas booklet which contains information about Ayurveda and the three doshas, a questionnaire for determining and getting to know your doshas, and instructions on how to balance your doshas with essential oils. Would make a beautiful gift..
